articles.author: Holly Yan, CNN
articles.title: Covid-19 now kills more than 1 American every minute. And the rate keeps accelerating as the death toll tops 300,000
articles.description: In the past week, an average of 2,403 people in the US have died from Covid-19 every day. That's an average of one Covid-19 death every 40 seconds. And hospitalizations keep breaking records.
articles.content:
(CNN)Every day, the number of families mourning the death of a loved one to Covid-19 keeps growing at a devastating rate. 
More than 300,000 people in the US have died from coronavirus since the fir… [+1343 chars]

articles.author: Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: US sets Covid-19 case, hospitalization and death records ahead of key meeting for Moderna's vaccine
articles.description: The US on Wednesday reported record numbers for Covid-19 cases, hospitalizations and deaths, ahead of a key meeting for what could be the country's second Covid-19 vaccine to get the green light.

articles.title: Fauci says he's confident in the vaccine. Here's why
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, the director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, said he feels fine after getting a Covid-19 vaccine and is very confident in the efficacy of the Moderna and Pfizer Covid-19 vaccines.

articles.title: Covid survivor gets emotional over surprise gift
articles.description: Janice Cockfield was near death for almost two months with Covid-19. After 110 days in the hospital, she was able to go home. CNN's Brooke Baldwin has more.

articles.title: Go inside a Covid-19 maternity ward
articles.description: CNN's Arwa Damon goes inside an Istanbul maternity ward where the mothers are also being treated for Covid-19.

articles.title: What's in the $900 billion Covid-19 relief package
articles.description: CNN's John Harwood breaks down what's in the $900 billion Covid relief package.

articles.author: Devon M. Sayers and Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: South Carolina governor tests positive for Covid-19
articles.description: South Carolina Gov. Henry McMaster tested positive for Covid-19 Monday evening.

articles.author: Opinion by Andrea Hoffman
articles.title: The fear I've been living with all my life

articles.title: Watch the full CNN/Sesame Street town hall
articles.description: CNN partnered with Sesame Street for "The ABC's of Covid-19: A CNN/Sesame Street Town Hall For Families," their fifth town hall to show families how to stay healthy during the holidays -- while still having fun -- during the Covid-19 pandemic.

articles.title: How the vaccine gets from the lab to your arm
articles.description: This is the long road Covid-19 vaccines take to get to you. All the while, staying ultra cold.

articles.title: Here's what the stimulus package means for Americans
articles.description: CNN's Brian Todd reports on what the new $900 billion Covid-19 stimulus package means for many struggling Americans.

articles.title: More than 90,000 Americans could die of Covid-19 in next three weeks, CDC forecast shows
articles.description: More than 38,000 Americans have died of Covid-19 in the first two weeks of the new year.
articles.content:
(CNN)More than 38,000 Americans have died of Covid-19 in the first two weeks of the new year.

articles.author: Danielle Wiener-Bronner, CNN Business
articles.title: Tyson fires managers following allegations of Covid-19 betting pool
articles.description: Tyson has fired seven management employees at its biggest pork processing plant in Waterloo, Iowa as a result of an independent investigation into allegations that some bet on how many workers would get infected with Covid-19.

articles.title: Why some communities may have trouble receiving Covid-19 vaccines
articles.description: CNN's Omar Jimenez takes a closer look at "pharmacy deserts" and the impact they can have on communities trying to access the coronavirus vaccine.

articles.title: Late-night hosts react to Covid-19 vaccine distribution
articles.description: Late-night hosts Trevor Noah, Jimmy Fallon, Stephen Colbert, and James Corden poke fun at the first distribution of coronavirus vaccines in the US.

articles.title: New, more contagious variant of Covid-19 detected in Colorado
articles.description: CNN's Nick Watt reports that one confirmed case and one suspected case of a new, more contagious variant of Covid-19 has been detected in Colorado as hospitals in the US are already filling up with coronavirus patients.

articles.title: 'I've seen 40 doctors': Covid-19 long hauler shares experience
articles.description: Abby Gresko Barclay speaks to CNN's Alisyn Camerota about her experience as a coronavirus long hauler and shares what it's like to experience coronavirus symptoms for 9-months, calling it a "nightmare."

articles.title: Listen to Trump's sudden stipulation for Covid-19 stimulus bill
articles.description: President Trump issued a sudden pre-Christmas demand for changes to a desperately needed $900 billion pandemic relief bill that could potentially risk shattering the bipartisan compromise reached by Democrats and Republicans. CNN's Joe Johns reports.

articles.title: See inside struggling California hospital as Covid-19 cases rise
articles.description: CNN's Lucy Kafanov goes inside a struggling California hospital as coronavirus cases continue to ravage the state.
